# auto-generated by grc.converter

id: sandia_utils_tag_debug_file
label: Tag File Debug
category: '[Sandia]/Sandia Utilities'

parameters:
-   id: filename
    label: File Name
    dtype: file_save
    default: '""'
-   id: type
    label: Input Type
    dtype: enum
    options: [complex, float, int, short, byte]
    option_attributes:
        size: [gr.sizeof_gr_complex, gr.sizeof_float, gr.sizeof_int, gr.sizeof_short,
            gr.sizeof_char]
    hide: part
-   id: num_inputs
    label: Num Inputs
    dtype: int
    default: '1'
    hide: part
-   id: vlen
    label: Vec Length
    dtype: int
    default: '1'
    hide: ${ 'part' if vlen == 1 else 'none' }
-   id: name
    label: Name
    dtype: string
-   id: filter
    label: Key Filter
    dtype: string
    default: '""'
-   id: display
    label: Display
    dtype: bool
    default: 'True'
    options: ['True', 'False']
    option_labels: ['On', 'Off']
-   id: filewrite
    label: Write to File
    dtype: bool
    default: 'True'
    options: ['True', 'False']
    option_labels: ['On', 'Off']

inputs:
-   domain: stream
    dtype: ${ type }
    vlen: ${ vlen }
    multiplicity: ${ num_inputs }
asserts:
- ${ num_inputs >= 1 }
- ${ vlen > 0 }

templates:
    imports: import sandia_utils
    make: sandia_utils.tag_debug_file(${type.size}*${vlen}, ${name}, ${filter}, ${filename});
        self.${id}.set_display(${display}); self.${id}.set_filewrite(${filewrite},
        True)
    callbacks:
    - set_display(${display})
    - set_filewrite(${filewrite}, False)

documentation: |-
    ######################################################
    ######################################################
    Add info here
    ######################################################
    ######################################################

file_format: 1
